hero.subtitle: Human-AI collaboration meets machine intelligence

worlds.title: Two Worlds, One Platform

human.title: Human Space

machine.title: Machine Space

step1.title: Connect Wallet
step1.description: Link your Solana wallet to create a secure, decentralized identity.

step2.title: Choose Your Space
step2.description: Enter Human Space to socialize and earn, or Machine Space to deploy agents.

step3.title: Start Earning
step3.description: Create value, trade skills, and earn USDT rewards in real-time.

token.title: $QUEEN Token
